effects.display_string: Set: Tiger Palm increases the damage of your next melee ability by 5.0%.
Set: Your other melee abilities increase the damage of your next Tiger Palm by 25%, stacking up to 6 times. 15% of Tiger Palm's damage is dealt onto nearby enemies, reduced beyond 5 targets.

spells.description: Equip: Your attacks and abilities have a chance to grant you 9 primary stat for 15 sec.

Use: Take on a Broker disguise, allowing yourself unfettered access to the Veiled Market.

Only usable in Tazavesh, the Veiled Market.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to let loose a nascent empowerment from the crystal, increasing a random secondary stat by 2,937 for 20 sec.

Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to send an orb of volatile black blood drifting to your target, exploding for 293,643 Shadow damage split between all nearby enemies on impact. Intercepting the orb allows you to siphon its power, instead increasing your Mastery by 3,489 for 15 sec.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
